short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you use Medidata products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mainly three tools now.

Tool 1: Expand or contract the left navigation in Rave EDC
Tool 2: Start timer for one page
Tool 3: Refresh all Medidata related pages
